arts.ttl: Ruel Sotiriou effort enough as lowly Bristol Rovers edge Huddersfield win
arts.sum: Sotiriou was on target after 10 minutes.

Bristol Rovers at least ended their three-match losing run at Shrewsbury, but the goalless draw leaves them just three points and one place above the drop. Seven of their 10 league wins have come at ...
